channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for IA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for IA

item.title: Report E-2023100935
item.description:
Report E-2023100935

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-07T18:15:22+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-20
  • City: COUNCIL BLUFFS
  • State: IA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDEX FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: Associate did not block and/or brace freight properly for transport. Freight was crushed causing release of product.

item.title: Report X-2023100510
item.description:
Report X-2023100510

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-08T18:14:16+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-23
  • City: CEDAR RAPIDS
  • State: IA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: package was leaking when being removed from truck. Box was put in plastic lined tote. DescribePack: The lids have bad seals and the contents were leaking from the caps on the jugs DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: item was placed in plastic lined tote

item.title: Report X-2023100265
item.description:
Report X-2023100265

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-08T18:14:16+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-26
  • City: CEDAR RAPIDS
  • State: IA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Box appears to have been dropped at some point which caused a small crack in the side of one plastic jug. Box was bagged up and put in a hazmat tote. DescribePack: 1 inch slice in side of plastic 1 gallon jug. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Box was bagged up and put in a hazmat tote.

item.title: Report X-2023100043
item.description:
Report X-2023100043

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-06T09:12:13+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-25
  • City: DAVENPORT
  • State: IA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDER RESPONDED TO THE SPILL WEARING PROPPER PPE AND USING DECSION TREE. RESPONDER RESPONDED USING CORROSIVE RESPONSE SHEET, CONTAINED THE SPILL, AND PROCESSED IT THROUGH THE DMP.
